abstract: JPMorgan Chase kicked off bank earnings season on Friday with news that its quarterly profit dropped 23 percent last year, expected results that weighed on the full-year profit.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase kicked off bank earnings season on Friday with news that its quarterly profit dropped 23 percent last year, expected results that weighed on the full-year profit.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase kicked off bank earnings season on Friday with news that its quarterly profit dropped 23 percent last year, results that weighed on the full-year profit.

headline.main: Weak Quarter Weighs on JPMorgan’s 2011 Profit

lead_paragraph: JPMorgan’s 2011 Profit Rises 9%  |  JPMorgan Chase kicked off bank earnings season on Friday with news that its profit rose 9 percent last year, a report diminished modestly by the recent turmoil on Wall Street.

abstract: On Dec. 7, the bank put out a detailed table showing how much exposure it had to countries like Italy, Greece and Spain. JPMorgan says it didn’t make updated European disclosures because they didn’t change materially.
snippet: On Dec. 7, the bank put out a detailed table showing how much exposure it had to countries like Italy, Greece and Spain. JPMorgan says it didn’t make updated European disclosures because they didn’t change materially.

headline.main: Why No Update on Europe From JPMorgan?
